sentences: Rolli on tähtsaim osa minu töös.
Mul oli väga hea roll sellel filmis.
context: The word 'rolli' is in the illative case of the Estonian noun 'roll', which means 'role' or 'part'. In this form, it indicates motion toward or into a role. It can be translated as 'into a role' or 'to a role' depending on context.
